name: corsair
description: Control Corsair iCUE devices - lighting, DPI, EQ, and profiles

functions.name: corsair_set_mouse_dpi
functions.description: Set mouse DPI (sensitivity). Auto-detects connected Corsair mouse. Common values: 400 (precision), 800 (balanced), 1600 (fast), 3200 (very fast).

functions.name: corsair_set_lighting
functions.description: Change LED color on Corsair devices. Optionally supports targeting by device name or by type.

color.description: Color name (red, green, blue, cyan, magenta, yellow, white, orange, purple, pink, gold, teal, gray) or 'off' to turn off

device.description: [optional] Target device by name or type.

functions.name: corsair_set_headset_eq
functions.description: Set headset equalizer preset. Auto-detects connected Corsair headset.

preset.description: EQ preset name like 'Pure Direct', 'Bass Boost', 'FPS', 'Movie', 'Music', 'Clear Chat', or custom preset name

functions.name: corsair_set_profile
functions.description: Switch to an iCUE profile. Profiles contain saved lighting and device settings.

functions.name: corsair_get_profiles
functions.description: List all available iCUE profiles. Use this to see what profiles can be activated.

functions.name: corsair_get_devices
functions.description: List all connected Corsair devices with their capabilities. Use this to see what devices are available.
